Name: Hot Apple Cider
Instructions: POUR all ingredients into saucepan and gently heat. When at desired temperature (not not overheat or even come close to boiling) pour into pre-warmed glass.
History: A drink promoted by Drambuie in 2015.
Nutrition: One serving of Hot Apple Cider contains 181 calories
Garnish: Apple wedge on rim or float dehydrated apple slice
